TneTabItem Properties

Properties
 NameDescription
CanClose

If true the tab can close and the close button is shown at the right side of the tab

Caption

Provides access to the 'text' element of a tab item

CaptionAlignment

Changes the alignment of the caption (text) of the tabitem

CloseAlignment

Changes the alignment of the close image

CloseImageHover

Represents property CloseImageHover.

CloseImageNormal

Represents property CloseImageNormal.

CloseImagePressed

Represents property CloseImagePressed.

ControlAlignment

Changes the alignment of the Control in the tabitem

ControlToShow

This property defines the control that appears in the tab item.

HintInterval

Represents property HintInterval.

HintText

Defines the text to show as hint.

MaxTabWidth

Represents property MaxTabWidth.

MinTabWidth

Represents property MinTabWidth.

PopupMenuAfterDefault

Represents property PopupMenuAfterDefault.

PopupMenuBeforeDefault

Represents property PopupMenuBeforeDefault.

PreviewImage

Represents property PreviewImage.

Provider

Represents property Provider.

ShowControl

Shows the control at the left side of the tab

ShowPopupMenu

Represents property ShowPopupMenu.

TabTag

This property holds the tag of the tab item (identifier)

TabWidth

Represents property TabWidth.

Top
